title: OMG Firewall Error !!
body:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/81096309/200092835?tab=overview

get my LP back 

so sad

replies.body: It's okay, you're not getting outta bronze anyway.

We're investigating an issue that may be giving a firewall error at the moment - check out[ this thread ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/IOuWqG7B-troubleshooting-connection-issues-4032015) for more information.
